forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the morning, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 4C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the morning, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 39F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds from time to time. Low 27F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. High 2C. Winds E at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High 36F. Winds E at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow flurries and snow showers. Low -2C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 50%. Snow accumulations less than 2cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Occasional snow showers. Low 29F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 50%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Freezing rain early...changing to rain in the afternoon. Precipitation will be light. High 2C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and snow in the morning turning to light rain in the afternoon. High 37F. Winds E at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of precip 60%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with light freezing rain expected. Low -2C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with rain and freezing rain expected...becoming light overnight. Low 29F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 60%.
